device.label: XBee Local AIO
device.description: Device that represents the analog functionality present locally on the gateway on some devices. It presents a subset of the XBee Analog Adapter driver options.

setting.label: XBee Device Manager
setting.tooltip: Must be set to the name of an XBeeDeviceManager instance.

setting.label: Sample rate
setting.tooltip: The sample rate of the XBee adapter in milliseconds.

setting.label: Channel 1 mode
setting.tooltip:
Operating input mode for pin 1 of the adapter. Must be a string value comprised of one of the following:
\t"TenV" - 0-10v input available on any channel. \t"CurrentLoop" - 0-20 mA current loop available on any channel.
